description: Deterministic tool-use tasks for repository inspection and patching workflows.

cases.prompt: Use repository search and file-read operations to locate where rollout statuses are transitioned.
cases.expected_outcome: Outcome should cite the correct module and summarize valid status transitions.

cases.prompt: Propose and apply a minimal code patch for a failing conformance test while preserving behavior.
cases.expected_outcome: Outcome should show a targeted patch and passing scoped tests without unrelated changes.
